stack.title: My stack
stack.p1: Currently I focus on front-end development and I commonly use the following stack in my projects:
stack.p2: I choose React.js for community support, Next.js for fast iteration, Tailwind CSS for productivity boosts, Drizzle ORM for being lightweight and flexible, and shadcn/ui for ready-to-use customizable components.
